archimate:Capability.name: Rental Prices & Transfer prices
archimate:Capability.documentation:
The rental price is based on the actual purchase cost of the tools, typically an average of the most recent purchase orders. It is a master data which is far as I know is sourcing’s responsibility to maintain, however the Videbæk tools team has for some time supported, as it was in our interest to have complete list of accurate rental prices.
Formulate: (((Purchasing Price Item/Expected Liftetime)+Yearly Operation Cost per item)/(365 days* Utilization rate)) - 30%
Tools daily rate are uploaded yearly
